TopicTitle: Is it possible to create new launch sites?

Articles.Content: Now that we have the new launch site system in, is it even possible to add new sites to it?

Yes it is as long you have the DLC installed. 

It's a call like psystemsetup.instance.addlaunchsite()

Setting up a launchsite requires some more work and a model Where you want to use it.

Kerbal konstructs will support this in the future, but currently I'm on vacation, so no instead of coding I'm swimming at the beach.
